Created an attachment (id=43498)
test ear

test ear
From development, I cannot reproduce the error just by importing. Is there something special you're doing as well?

It appears that with the latest builds, this issue has been resolved. I suspect (from the stack trace) that this was related to the wrong renderer being loaded, which has been resolved. 

Resolving bug as WORKSFORME. If you find there is some step in the scenario that is missing, please feel free to reopen with more details.

Do you know which specfic plugins would have the fix?
We can overlay on top of our app (we have 1.5 rc4) and try. Thanks

The renderer issue was directly related to early startup plugins. If, by chance, you have fixed plugins that had this issue, recently, then that should be what you need. I would recommend grabbing a full WTP build and also (at least the first time) run with -clean on the workspace (if you're reusing an existing workspace).
